content:
Getting this information message: The string value contains text that looks like embedded HTML tags. If this content is rendered to HTML without appropriate post-processing, it may be a security risk
It's because of the yellow "known issue" box here: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/case-reporting/branches/master/index.html.

Is this something I need to deal with or can I suppress? And if I do suppress, what reason can I give for suppressing?
